reading_passages.title: About Government and Citizenship
reading_passages.text: Module 4 Government and Citizenship In this module, you will learn about how nations across the globe interact and form a world community. You will also learn about the different world governments and how people participate in those governments. About the Photo: The Palace of Westminster in London is where Parliament meets. Parliament is the United Kingdom’s highest legislative authority.
